org.gbif.common.search.solr.builders

Class EmbeddedServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.common.search.solr.builders.EmbeddedServerBuilder

  • public class EmbeddedServerBuilder
extends Object
    Builds an instance of a EmbeddedSolrServer. The SolrClient can be created at a specific directory; set by the method withServerHomeDir, is the home directory is not specified a temporary directory is created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedServerBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient build()
      Builds a EmbeddedSolrServer instance.
      EmbeddedServerBuilder withCoreName(String coreName)
      Solr coreName name, defaults to collection1.
      EmbeddedServerBuilder withDeleteOnExit(boolean deleteOnExit)
      Flag to determine if the solr home directory must be deleted (used by tests cases mostly).
      EmbeddedServerBuilder withServerHomeDir(String serverHomeDir)
      Solr home root directory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmbeddedServerBuilder

        public EmbeddedServerBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient build()
        Builds a EmbeddedSolrServer instance. The server is created at the specified directory. If a solrHome directory is not specified a temporary directory is created (used by test cases).

      • withCoreName

        public EmbeddedServerBuilder withCoreName(String coreName)
        Solr coreName name, defaults to collection1. This is important since 4.4 as the solr directory has to have a subfolder with that name!

      • withDeleteOnExit

        public EmbeddedServerBuilder withDeleteOnExit(boolean deleteOnExit)
        Flag to determine if the solr home directory must be deleted (used by tests cases mostly).

      • withServerHomeDir

        public EmbeddedServerBuilder withServerHomeDir(String serverHomeDir)
        Solr home root directory. This is the parent folder of the actual core created.
